last_episode_to_air.name: Humans Are...
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Jun-ho races to reach the island, tensions peak in the final round. The last players face an impossible situation in the closing minutes of the game.

tv_shows.name: Squid Game
tv_shows.overview: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Ready to run for your lives? Player 456 returns for more heart-pounding children's games, facing deadly new challenges — but armed with a hidden agenda.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Gi-hun is devastated by the loss of his best friend and sinks into deep despair after discovering that the Game Master had hidden his true identity to secretly infiltrate the game.

tv_shows.tagline: The final games begin.

last_episode_to_air.name: Your Uncle Is... That Guy?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bom bravely faces the truth with Jae-gyu by her side. As Bom's return to Seoul comes near, she and Jae-gyu make memories in Shinsu together!

tv_shows.name: Spring Fever
tv_shows.overview: After moving to a quiet rural town to heal from past heartbreak, a withdrawn teacher slowly rediscovers warmth and joy through her unexpected connection with a rough-around-the-edges but kindhearted local man.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
Follows Yun Bom, who, after enduring emotional turmoil in Seoul, moves to the small town of Sinsu to begin anew as an exchange teacher. Initially detached and cold toward everything, she gradually opens her heart after meeting Seon Jae Gyu.

Seon Jae Gyu is a key figure who stirs up the village with his outrageous antics. He is also the CEO of JK Power Energy and the uncle of Seon Han Gyeol, a student at Sinsu High. Despite his large build and rough first impression reminiscent of a back-alley tough guy, Jae Gyu is someone full of unexpected charm, unwavering devotion, and a deep consideration for others.

tv_shows.tagline: Spring didn’t just arrive — it rewrote her story.

tv_shows.name: Nonstop
tv_shows.overview: Nonstop is a South Korean slice-of-life sitcom that broadcast its first season in 2000 on MBC. It continued with 5 more seasons. The series was popular for its cast of teen idols, many who debuted through the show..

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hu-min, Hyun-tak and Eunjang students gather to engage in a final confrontation against Baek-jin's gang. In the end, who will prevail?

tv_shows.name: Weak Hero
tv_shows.overview: With the aid of unexpected friends, a gifted but introverted student confronts bullies and violent foes — unaware of how dangerous his world will become.

seasons.name: Class 1
seasons.overview: With the aid of unexpected friends, a gifted but introverted student confronts bullies and violent foes — unaware of how dangerous his world will become.

seasons.name: Class 2
seasons.overview: After losing his friend to violence, model student Yeon Si-eun vows not to repeat history at his new school in a tale of dazzling growth and desperate survival.

tv_shows.tagline: Stand to protect it.

last_episode_to_air.name: Happy Ending
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ju Kyung and Su Ho finally confirm that their feelings for one another haven't changed after all these years. After shedding tears from their reunion, they start their happy relationship, which is more grown-up from their high school days. Meanwhile, Seo Jun, who has now moved on from his unrequited love, gets ready to debut while Hee Kyung asks Su Ho to include "Missing Love" on Seo Joon's debut album.

tv_shows.name: True Beauty
tv_shows.overview: Lim Ju-kyung is a high school student. Since she was little, she has had a complex about her appearance. To hide her bare face, Ju-kyung always wears make-up. Her excellent make-up skills make her pretty and she hides her bare face in front of others. She gets involved with 2 men; Lee Su-ho and Han Seo-jun.
tv_shows.tagline: Can makeup make it last?

last_episode_to_air.name: Here's to All You've Been Through
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Yang family finally enjoys the fruits of their labor, sudden agony strikes — testing their resolve and the strength of their enduring love.

tv_shows.name: When Life Gives You Tangerines
tv_shows.overview: In Jeju, a spirited girl and a steadfast boy's island story blossoms into a lifelong tale of setbacks and triumphs — proving love endures across time.

seasons.name: Limited Series
seasons.overview: The drama follows the adventurous life and many trials of Ae-sun (IU), a poor girl wanting to become a poet who was born in Jeju in 1951, and Gwan-sik (Park Bo-gum), a young man who cherishes and loves her. The drama is narrated by their daughter, Yang Geum-myeong.

tv_shows.tagline: Dedicated to you. Still blooming, always dreaming.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: The students make it to the quarantine camp, each of them weighed down by tragic loss. Months later, they hang on to hope for a survivor.

tv_shows.name: All of Us Are Dead
tv_shows.overview: A high school becomes ground zero for a zombie virus outbreak. Trapped students must fight their way out — or turn into one of the rabid infected.
tv_shows.tagline: Hope is the most painful torture for people who want to despair.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: While some secrets come out, some romances solidify. Will Mu-hee and Ho-jin get their happy ending — or are some emotions too hard to interpret?

tv_shows.name: Can This Love Be Translated?
tv_shows.overview: The emotions of a celebrity and her interpreter get lost in translation as they travel the world filming a TV show. Will love find its own language?
tv_shows.tagline: The most difficult language, yours.

last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Operation
last_episode_to_air.overview: Do Gi finds the bird nest where the late Yoo Sun A left the intel and learns that she sacrificed her life to save her comrades. He also finds out that higher-ranking officers fabricated the special mission for their personal gains. To eliminate the problematic officers, Do Gi uses all the help he can get.

tv_shows.name: Taxi Driver
tv_shows.overview: A former special forces soldier delivers revenge for victims of injustice while working for a secret organization that fronts as a taxi company.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A former special forces soldier delivers revenge for victims of injustice while working for a secret organization that fronts as a taxi company.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The Rainbow Deluxe Taxi crew reunites to fight injustice once again, with a new member joining their ranks, but they must now face a mysterious organization that threatens them while they continue to seek justice for the wronged.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The Rainbow Deluxe Taxi is back in business. This time, a call from Japan brings the team together. A girl goes missing after making a call to the Rainbow Taxi. The only lead they have is her name and the phone she called. But even so, the team tenaciously looks for the lead, which is what they are good at. As the team investigates, they find out that there’s a Japanese loan company behind this case. With new cars and equipment, the team goes to help out the girl who needs help. Starting with this international case, the team will fight on behalf of everyone who has been wronged in this society again this season.

tv_shows.tagline: For the wronged victims who no one protect.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jin Ho-gyeong takes a risk to protect Jinyowon and its treasures from attack. Having had a glimpse into the future, Uk braces for the inevitable.

tv_shows.name: Alchemy of Souls
tv_shows.overview: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

seasons.name: Part 1
seasons.overview: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

seasons.name: Part 2
seasons.overview: Jang Uk, now a fierce but troubled hunter of the soul shifters, meets an imprisoned young woman who seeks his help to reclaim her freedom.

tv_shows.tagline: Stay close, so no one can attack us!

last_episode_to_air.name: To My Lonely Sister
last_episode_to_air.overview: Unfolds as Ha Neul, a high school girl with a reclusive, lonely older sister, begins a plan to help her sister escape from her room. With the theme of love and recovery between families, it depicts the process in which the Ha Neul overcomes her family's pain together.

tv_shows.name: KBS Drama Special
tv_shows.overview: Forget the existing one-act dramas! Short but impactive! KBS Drama Special presents high quality single episode dramas. Dramas are the broadcast content with the widest public appeal. KBS Drama Special will produce short dramas of far-reaching impact involving at times a serious social message, unique emotions or perspectives. It will stay abreast of modern viewership.

seasons.overview: The KBS Drama Special is back as always in 2022. From a suspenseful psychological thriller about desire starring young actors to a fantasy story where villains are punished with a superpower to a heart-warming coming-of-age drama about ballet to a story about a 19-year-old being lost and in love for the first time to the romance among COVID-19 patients in the isolated ward to a story about a man who is serious about panties and life to a frolicsome, touching romantic comedy and to the last episode set in a military base, this year's drama special is coming back with eight one-act dramas full of vibrant charms, commemorating the 38th anniversary

The KBS Drama Special, a collection of episodes that are fully packed with well-constructed content, has made its comeback in 2023 as KBS airs the series annually. The stories to be told will include one about a typical working professional who makes a decision to better his life that ends up being the wrong decision, a coming-of-age story of people trying to protect a kid who lies to hide the family history, a story of a female amateur futsal team's passion as they become one through the sport, a story about the victim, perpetrator, and bystander of bullying at a school, a hectic, wisecracking rom-com about a Joseon scholar who witnesses a secret rendezvous of his wife and his servant, and a rom-com set in a university where a student tries to mess with the smartest student in class to be at the top. The 2023 KBS Drama Special offers a plethora of stories accompanied by extreme thrills, fresh takes, and heartwarming sensations. Expect to find an episode that hits the sweet spot!

In a new phase of KBS's one-act drama project, fresh actors, directors, and writers come together to provide entertainment and inspiration. Every story has something unique to offer! A young historian is determined to preserve the past, while the prince seeks to erase it and take the throne, leading to a collision of values. Cutie, the obscure member of an idol group that disbanded 13 years ago, begins his journey of hunting for Handsome, another member who's been elusive. In the tumultuous year before the Korean War, two women, Young Bok from Korea and Sachiko from Japan, fight for the love of the same husband. This is the dramatic story of two ladies who can never be friends. A seasoned member of a street-view shooting team encounters a directionally challenged woman who claims that a figure caught in the street-view is her father. Ha Neul, a high school girl, devises a clever plan to coax her reclusive sister out of her room! Immerse yourself in a collection of touching stories.

tv_shows.name: Our Universe
tv_shows.overview: Two in-laws forced to raise their orphaned nephew together slowly overcome their misunderstandings, finding personal growth and an unexpected romance through co-parenting under one roof.
tv_shows.tagline: We met not by chance, but by the universe

last_episode_to_air.name: Dreamers
last_episode_to_air.overview: A fire approaches as if it would devour Doldam Hospital at any moment. Only after evacuating all the patients do the staff realise Teacher Kim was gone.

tv_shows.name: Dr. Romantic
tv_shows.overview: An eccentric, triple board-certified virtuoso surgeon leaves a top job in Seoul and ends up at a provincial hospital, where he mentors young doctors.

seasons.name: Dr. Romantic
seasons.overview: Bu Yong-ju was once a famous surgeon at the peak of his career at a major hospital. But he suddenly gives it all up one day to live in seclusion and work as a neighborhood doctor in a small town. He now goes by Teacher Kim and refers to himself as the “Romantic Doctor”. Meanwhile, Gang Dong-ju became a doctor to make something of himself after growing up poor, and he seeks out VIP patients to achieve the success that he desperately wants. Yun Seo-jeong is a passionate young surgeon who is haunted by a mistake from her past and tries to get over it. When Dong-ju and Seo-jeong meet the quirky Teacher Kim, their lives and careers will never be the same again.

seasons.name: Dr. Romantic 2
seasons.overview: Along with genius Teacher Kim, Cha Eun-jae is a second-year fellow in the cardio surgery department who enjoys studying and has confidently walked the path of an elite student for most of her life. Seo U-jin, a cynical second year fellow who doesn’t believe in happiness because of his hardships growing up, but he shows impressive levels of concentration and talent when he is performing surgery.

seasons.name: Dr. Romantic 3
seasons.overview: Teacher Kim used to be alone in protecting Doldam Hospital, but now he's not alone anymore. With the mindset that he'll did anything if it gives money, there is Seo U-jin who has been reborn as a doctor who truly knows how to care for patients. There is Cha Eun-jae, who no longer runs out of the operating room due to anxiety. Teacher Kim, who has dreamed of build a regional trauma center with his students and colleagues. Finally, a regional trauma center built at Doldam Hospital. A perfect trauma center with a clean exterior and state-of-the-art facilities but it couldn't open properly. The regional trauma center faces a precarious fate...  Will Teacher Kim be able to establish the regional trauma center at Doldam Hospital which was his long-cherished desire?

tv_shows.tagline: May values ​​not die and beauty not be shallow...

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the final pieces of Dong-eun's revenge plot slot into place, she considers what comes next — and what it will mean for Yeo-jeong.

tv_shows.name: The Glory
tv_shows.overview: Years after surviving horrific abuse in high school, a woman puts an elaborate revenge scheme in motion to make the perpetrators pay for their crimes.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A high school student dreams of becoming an architect. However, she had to drop out of school after suffering from brutal school violence. Years later, the perpetrator gets married and has a kid. Once the kid is in elementary school, the former victim becomes her homeroom teacher and starts her thorough revenge towards the perpetrators and bystanders of her bullying days.

tv_shows.tagline: Let's wilt and die together.

last_episode_to_air.name: The Hobby Called Love
last_episode_to_air.overview: Eun-ho's confession and subsequent actions leave Si-yeol feeling overwhelmed. But after spending quality time together, they end up going on a date.

tv_shows.name: No Tail to Tell
tv_shows.overview: Imbued with the power to grant wishes, a cynical nine-tailed fox's life takes a turn when she encounters a soccer player — altering both of their fates.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Eun-ho, a free-spirited gumiho, avoids good deeds and romance to steer clear of becoming human. Her carefree life takes an unexpected turn after a fateful encounter with a self-absorbed soccer star.

tv_shows.tagline: A gumiho who never wanted to be human… until love found her

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Counters give it their all to fight the mighty Pil-gwang. Will Ju-seok be able to overcome his demons and put an end to this life-or-death battle?

tv_shows.name: The Uncanny Counter
tv_shows.overview: A group of supernatural demon hunters known as "Counters," each with unique abilities, disguise themselves as employees of a noodle restaurant, while tracking down evil spirits that terrorize the mortal world.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Noodle shop employees by day and demon hunters by night, the Counters use special abilities to chase down malevolent spirits that prey on humans.

seasons.name: Season 2: Counter Punch
seasons.overview: Armed with new powers and fresh recruits, the Counters continue their battle against evil demons who feed on humans.

tv_shows.tagline: We sell noodles and catch evil spirits!

tv_shows.name: High Kick
tv_shows.overview: High Kick! was a popular South Korean situation comedy revolving around the life of the Lee family, taking place in Seoul at the same time as the broadcast. The title of the show "High Kick!" has several implications, one of which is the oft-depicted high kicks of Yoon-ho, one of the main characters. The show aired in South Korea from Monday to Friday in sitcom format. Due to its popularity, the show filmed more episodes than were initially planned. Many of the characters starred in commercials and advertisements in Korea. The show's popularity also led to High Kick Through the Roof, which aired in 2009-2010, and High Kick 3: The Counterattack of the Short Leg, which aired in 2011-2012.

last_episode_to_air.name: Goodbye and See You Again
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shin proposes to Eun-tak amid the falling cherry blossoms. On a whim he wants to have the wedding in a few days, so they jump right into preparations.

tv_shows.name: Goblin
tv_shows.overview: In his quest for a bride to break his immortal curse, a 939-year-old guardian of souls meets a grim reaper and a sprightly student with a tragic past.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Kim Shin was once an unbeatable general in Goryeo's military who died a tragic death. He now possesses immortality but is tired of living while everyone else around him dies. For 900 years, Shin has searched for his bride, a mortal who can pull out the sword and end his life. One day, he encounters Ji Eun-tak, a positive, upbeat high school student who can see the dead and has gone through tragic events, yet still stays strong. She claims to be the Goblin's bride who can end his immortal life, but what appears to be an easy task, only gets complicated, as the two fall in love.

tv_shows.tagline: A mysterious romance between a goblin and a young human bride.

last_episode_to_air.name: Graduation Day
last_episode_to_air.overview: Parents and children fight to protect each other. Will this repeated war ever end?

tv_shows.name: Moving
tv_shows.overview: Children who live in hiding with superpowers, along with their parents who live with painful secrets of the past, face enormous dangers together.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: These three students try to hide their special abilities from other people, while their parents struggle to protect them from being used by other people.

tv_shows.tagline: We can be heroes or monsters.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 20
last_episode_to_air.overview: Han-seok lets nothing stand in his way of revenge. Seeking justice the mafia way, Vincenzo gives his enemies a slow and painful death.

tv_shows.name: Vincenzo
tv_shows.overview: At the age of eight, Park Joo Hyeong left for Italy after being adopted. Now an adult, he is known as Vincenzo Cassano and employed by a Mafia family as a consigliere. Due to warring Mafia factions, he flies to South Korea where he gets involved with lawyer Hong Cha Young. She is the type of attorney who will do anything to win a case. Now back in his motherland, he gives an unrivalled conglomerate a taste of his own medicine—with a side of his own version of justice.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: At the age of eight, Park Joo Hyeong left for Italy after being adopted. Now an adult, he is known as Vincenzo Cassano and employed by a Mafia family as a consigliere. Due to warring Mafia factions, he flies to South Korea where he gets involved with lawyer Hong Cha Young. She is the type of attorney who will do anything to win a case. Now back in his motherland, he gives an unrivalled conglomerate a taste of his own medicine—with a side of his own version of justice.

tv_shows.tagline: Only evil can punish evil.

tv_shows.name: The Judge Returns
tv_shows.overview: The return of corrupt judge Lee Han-young, who was a slave to a large law firm, to the past 10 years ago. He makes new choices to punish evil and implement justice.

tv_shows.name: The Manipulated
tv_shows.overview: Mild-mannered Tae-jung is wrongfully imprisoned for a heinous crime. He soon discovers that a mysterious figure named Yo-han orchestrated his downfall. Fueled by vengeance, Tae-jung sets out to make Yo-han pay.

last_episode_to_air.name: Our Personal Heaven
last_episode_to_air.overview: Do-hee finds herself catatonic after her loss. Desperate for Gu-won's return, she makes a Christmas wish for her love — which Noh Suk-nyeo hears.

tv_shows.name: My Demon
tv_shows.overview: A pitiless demon becomes powerless after getting entangled with an icy heiress, who may hold the key to his lost abilities — and his heart.
tv_shows.tagline: A demon who lost his powers becomes a bodyguard to a demonic human.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sa-rang finally makes a decisive choice about her future. After delaying his plans to make room for Sa-rang's, Won approaches her with a question.

tv_shows.name: King the Land
tv_shows.overview: Amid a tense inheritance fight, a charming heir clashes with his hardworking employee who's known for her irresistible smile — which he cannot stand.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Heir Gu Won cannot stand fake smiles. When he meets Cheon Sa-rang, her sincere smile is at the ready. The pair seek to create happy moments where they can smile brightly at each other. King the Land is a VVIP business lounge, a paradise catering to wealthy hoteliers. It is owned by King Group, with hotels, distribution companies, and an airline in its portfolio. Now, Won has been thrown into an inheritance tug-of-war.  With his brilliant mind, innate grace, and captivating charm, he has everything but lacks common sense when dating. Sa-rang makes the world brighter with just her smile. She is thrilled to land a job at the King Hotel, where she had some of her happiest times as a child. She must now put those sweet memories away and mature quickly to face the frequent workplace prejudices and misunderstandings that come her way.

tv_shows.tagline: A 7-star sweet romance.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Eun-sung executes his final plan to make Hae-in his own. As she tries to escape from his grasp with the help of Hyun-woo, will they finally find peace?

tv_shows.name: Queen of Tears
tv_shows.overview: The queen of department stores and the prince of supermarkets weather a marital crisis—until love miraculously begins to bloom again.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Marriage or war of the century? Hong Hae-in, the third-generation heiress to Queens Group and the queen of department stores, has been married for three years to Baek Hyun-woo, Yongdu-ri village chief's son and the prince of supermarkets. As the couple weathers a marital crisis, they discover a miraculous new beginning that rewrites their love story.

tv_shows.tagline: The wedding of the century or the war of the century?

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: Meri’s ex publicly accuses her and Wooju, igniting a media frenzy as the Myungsoon-dang scandal peaks. Refusing to back down, they confront the chaos.

tv_shows.name: Would You Marry Me?
tv_shows.overview: A couple who pretend to be newlyweds, find themselves developing genuine feelings for each other as they navigate their fake marriage.
tv_shows.tagline: A Fake Marriage, A True Romance

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: A series of tough choices and sudden crises keeps life at the hospital as busy as ever. Through it all, the five friends continue to follow their hearts.

tv_shows.name: Hospital Playlist
tv_shows.overview: Every day is extraordinary for five doctors and their patients inside a hospital, where birth, death and everything in between coexist.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview:
The special extra episode of Hospital Playlist featured interviews with the cast, behind-the-scenes footage from the set, song performances and hilarious bloopers from season 1.

It also shows the very first time the whole cast met each other as well as the first script reading.

tv_shows.tagline: The slightly special everyday of us ordinary people

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: The TV debate begins, and the smoking gun that will bring down Choi Doha is at Miho's fingers.

tv_shows.name: Big Mouth
tv_shows.overview: A lawyer with a ten-percent winning rate is caught up in a murder case and becomes the notorious and genius con artist, Big Mouse, overnight. In order to survive and protect his family, he tries to reveal the true colors of the privileged people involved in a huge conspiracy.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Park Changho is known since his school days as "Big Mouth" because he talks big and promises big things but cannot follow it up. He is also an infamous lawyer with a very low rate of success who was hired by a mayor because of his incompetence. Unfortunately, he was framed as the notorious and mysterious swindler "Big Mouse" and sent to prison. Go Miho is Changho's loving wife who works as a nurse. She has strong personality and will do anything to prove the innocence of her husband and help solve the case the mayor has given to her husband. Will Miho be successful in proving her husband's innocence? Or will her investigations lead to opening a can of worms?

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Galvanized by their duty to their loved ones, Gun-woo and Woo-jin tread forward to take down Myeong-gil — once and for all.

tv_shows.name: Bloodhounds
tv_shows.overview: Two young boxers band together with a benevolent moneylender to take down a ruthless loan shark who preys on the financially desperate.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Two young boxers band together with a benevolent moneylender to take down a ruthless loan shark who preys on the financially desperate.

tv_shows.tagline: Their Biggest Fight is Not in The Ring.

last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Fight
last_episode_to_air.overview: The study group members find out about the incident Han Ul was involved in a year ago and why he is so obsessed with the school gang. Since it might put Han Kyeong in danger, the members try to come up with a solution to get through this crisis. Meanwhile, Han Kyeong tries to persuade the Vice Principal to stand with her, but she gets in danger instead.

tv_shows.name: Study Group
tv_shows.overview: Nicknamed the "school for future criminals," Yuseong Technical High School isn't exactly the ideal place to study. A rarity among his peers, Ga-min is a student with just one goal: to get into university. At a school where it's every man for himself, he is rejected from countless study groups before he decides to form his own. Will he be able to defeat the odds and achieve his dreams?

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 13
last_episode_to_air.overview: With her life turned upside down, Ka-young searches for Iblis to make her final wish. Will they find eternal happiness, or be bound by cruel fate?

tv_shows.name: Genie, Make a Wish
tv_shows.overview: After a thousand years, a quirky genie returns to grant wishes to a woman born without feelings. Can his magic bring love and wonder to her world?
tv_shows.tagline: Come now, to corruption!

last_episode_to_air.name: The End
last_episode_to_air.overview: Seung-hyo and Seok-ryu, happy in their relationship, prepare for a lifetime together. They inspire each other as they work toward their personal goals.

tv_shows.name: Love Next Door
tv_shows.overview: A woman attempting to reboot her life returns to Korea and becomes entangled with her childhood friend — with whom she shares a complicated history.

seasons.name: Limited Series
seasons.overview: As kids, they were at turns friends and foes. As adults, they're two crazy successful people living on opposite sides of the world. When a chance meeting throws them together again, will their relationship blossom into something more?

last_episode_to_air.name: We Are The Champions
last_episode_to_air.overview: Amidst the chaos, Dong-joo and Team Inseong begin their decisive battle to determine the fate of the city. Carrying the weight of everyone's hopes and expectations on their backs, will they be able to achieve the ultimate victory and emerge as true heroes?

tv_shows.name: Good Boy
tv_shows.overview: Olympic medalists join the police force through a special recruitment program, trading medals for badges as they tackle violent crimes and injustices with their athletic skills.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After 11 years, the police revive their special recruitment for former national athletes. Once hailed as heroes, these world-class medalists now face harsh realities. Despite financial struggles, unexpected tragedies, and discrimination within the force, the athletes, each with their own story, reunite as a special task force to take on major crimes with the grit and skills they honed as athletes.

tv_shows.tagline: A different purpose with the same heart of gold.

last_episode_to_air.name: Though Unusual and Peculiar
last_episode_to_air.overview: Young-woo receives evidence that could make or break her case, while Min-woo changes his plans — and Jun-ho follows his heart.

tv_shows.name: Extraordinary Attorney Woo
tv_shows.overview: With a genius-level IQ, Woo Young-woo learns to embrace her extraordinary self while forming a tight-knit community of friends and allies.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Brilliant attorney Woo Young-woo tackles challenges in the courtroom and beyond as a newbie at a top law firm and a woman on the autism spectrum.

tv_shows.tagline: My name is Woo Young-woo, whether it is read straight or flipped. Kayak, deed, rotator, noon, racecar, Woo Young-woo.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 14
last_episode_to_air.overview: Su Ryeon falls over the cliff and doesn't resurface. The rescuers search to no avail. Meanwhile, Seo Jin stands trial for the murder of Oh Yoon Hee and the attempted murder of Su Ryeon. Eun Byeol's testimony against her mother shocks everyone in court. Three years later, at Ro Na and Seok Hoon's recital, Logan chases a woman who looks like Su Ryeon.

tv_shows.name: The Penthouse
tv_shows.overview: A woman puts everything on the line to achieve her goal of being able to move into a luxury penthouse in the Gangnam District. In the process, she gradually finds herself turning into a monster.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The residents of Hera Palace, a luxury penthouse apartment with 100 floors, have many secrets and hidden ambitions. Sim Su Ryeon, who was born into wealth, is the queen of the penthouse apartment. Cheon Seo Jin, the prima donna of the residence, does all she can to give everything to her daughter. Oh Yoon Hee comes from a poor family background, but she strives to enter high society by becoming the queen of the penthouse, the pinnacle of success in her eyes.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Seo Jin and Dan Tae eventually get rid of everyone who was in their way. They shamelessly frame Yoon Hee for the murder of Su Ryeon and even cover up the death of Seol A. The residents of Hera Palace believe everything will return to how it used to be. However, the tides change when Yoon Hee escapes prison and Eun Byeol discovers the truth. Their mysterious fates are still yet to be seen. Will they manage to protect their precious palace until the very end?

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Su Ryeon finally takes revenge on the residents of Hera Palace. They lost all of their money by investing in Cheonsoo District, and even worse, they stand before the court for covering up Seol A’s death. Those greedy residents of Hera Palace who caught themselves in their own traps end up losing their fortunes, reputations, and everything they had, and Su Ryeon succeeds in getting her revenge on Dan Tae who tried to kill her. When Su Ryeon thought the nightmare is finally over, she witnesses Logan’s death right before her eyes. Who could have planned to murder Logan, and what will happen to the residents of Hera Palace next? Their desire for revenge is not over yet.

tv_shows.tagline: 100th Floor Bloody Penthouse.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Before departing, Jeong Hyeok leaves behind a surprise that keeps on giving. Dan delivers bittersweet justice.

tv_shows.name: Crash Landing on You
tv_shows.overview: A paragliding mishap drops a South Korean heiress in North Korea -- and into the life of an army officer, who decides he will help her hide.
tv_shows.tagline: Sometimes the wrong train takes you to the right station.

tv_shows.name: Pure in Heart
tv_shows.overview: Yang Gook-hwa (Korean: 양 국화) is a nineteen-year-old country girl who leaves Yanbian and travels to Seoul because she is marrying Hong Soon-goo (Korean: 홍 순구), the third son in an average but respectable family. When she arrives in Seoul, however, she finds out that her fiancé has just died in a terrible car accident. Instead of returning to Yanbian, she decides to stay and create a new life in Korea while sending money back to her aunt and uncle.

tv_shows.name: Idol I
tv_shows.overview: Maeng Se-na, a top star criminal lawyer who has been a fangirl for fifteen years, tries to prove her favorite idol’s innocence, who is suspected of murder.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Fighting for his love, Sang-ung goes toe-to-toe with the Mundane Vanguard. Will he and his friends finally become the heroes they were meant to be?

tv_shows.name: Cashero
tv_shows.overview: An ordinary man who inherits super strength discovers a greater evil out to steal his power. The one catch? Every use drains money from his wallet.
tv_shows.tagline: Burning salary to save lives. My cash, my power.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: The police close in on the thieves as they prepare to transport the money out of the Mint. Fierce protests force Sangman to put his foot down.

tv_shows.name: Money Heist: Korea - Joint Economic Area
tv_shows.overview: Disguised under the shadows of a mask, a crew of desperados band together under the leadership of a criminal mastermind known only as “The Professor” to pull off the biggest heist Korea has ever seen.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Thieves overtake the mint of a unified Korea. With hostages trapped inside, the police must stop them — as well as the shadowy mastermind behind it all.

tv_shows.tagline: Witness a heist like no other.

tv_shows.name: Story of a Mermaid
tv_shows.overview: 《인어 아가씨》는 MBC에서 2002년 6월 24일부터 2003년 6월 27일까지 246부작으로 방영되었던 드라마이다.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Su-min's disappearance after Min-hwan's death, the fate intertwined with Ji-won finally dissolves. Ji-won receives a formal invitation to Chairman Yu Han-il's home and starts planning her future with Ji-hyuk. Just as they are about to attain their happiness, Su-min reappears to conclude the long-forged tragic fate.

tv_shows.name: Marry My Husband
tv_shows.overview: Kang Ji-won, a terminally ill cancer patient, is killed by her husband and best friend after she witnesses them having an affair. She wakes up 10 years before the incident and decides to seek revenge with the help of Yu Ji-hyuk, a director at the company where she works. Now, she must reclaim her fate and eliminate the trash from her life.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Life takes an unexpected turn for Kang Ji-won, who witnesses her husband and her best friend having an affair. Ji-won is killed, but miraculously travels back ten years in time, given the chance to re-do her life. In her quest for changing fate, she partners with Ji-hyuk and seeks a way to pass on her unfortunate fate to the two betrayers - her husband and her best friend.

tv_shows.tagline: A drama about creating a new destiny.

last_episode_to_air.name: Marginal Man
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Ho-jae's enemy threatens to hurt those closest to him, he risks everything to protect them. Will he survive the ferocious beasts and save Chae-ok?

tv_shows.name: Gyeongseong Creature
tv_shows.overview: Gyeongseong, 1945. In Seoul's grim era under colonial rule, an entrepreneur and a sleuth fight for survival and face a monster born out of human greed.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: 1945, Gyeongseong South Korea. Jang Tae-sang is a rich man. He is known as the most attractive man around Bukchon in Gyeongseong. He is also a reliable source for information in the area. His talents, including the ability to respond quickly to situations, keen insight and his sociability, have led him to his current position. When he comes into contact with Yoon Chae-ok, he has to reevaluate his priorities as a person.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In 2024 Seoul, fate-bound ties to Gyeongseong unravel when Chae-ok meets Ho-jae, a man with an uncanny resemblance to Tae-sang. What will destiny reveal?

tv_shows.tagline: Behold, the powers of destiny. Beware, the powers of karma.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 54
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jang Geum's suggestion to perform surgery on the King is received with displeasure. Jang Geum is reunited with Min Jung Ho as she is sent away from the palace.

tv_shows.name: Jewel in the Palace
tv_shows.overview: Orphaned Jang-geum becomes the first female physician in the Joseon Dynasty and her determination is tested when people around her start showing their true faces.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 25
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jun-pyo asks Yumi to make the lunchbox again, proving that Yumi had taken credit for the lunch that Jan-di had made for him.

tv_shows.name: Boys Over Flowers
tv_shows.overview: Unassuming high school girl Jan-di stands up to — and eventually falls for — a spoiled rich kid who belongs to the school's most powerful clique.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Working-class girl Geum Jan-di winds up at an exclusive prep academy and teams up with the popular boys of F4, who literally rule the school.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 100
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gyu Jin sneaks away from work to get a quick glimpse at his boys at daycare and gets into a car accident. Ok Ja slips and ends up with a cast on her leg. She and Chi Su drop out of the dance competition, but Ok Boon and Young Dal take their place. Meanwhile, Joon Seon looks to hire more stuntmen, and Ga Hee gets a surprise visit from Hyo Sin.

tv_shows.name: Once Again
tv_shows.overview: Back at square one as divorcees, four siblings take another shot at love and dreams — after mustering up the courage to convince their parents first.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Back at square one as divorcees, four siblings take another shot at love and dreams — after mustering up the courage to convince their parents first.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: A final attempt to put a stop to Lim's ambitions comes with profound consequences. Gon travels far and wide in search of Tae-eul.

tv_shows.name: The King: Eternal Monarch
tv_shows.overview: Korean emperor Lee Gon tries to close the doors to a parallel world which was opened by demons; a detective tries to protect the people and the one she loves.

last_episode_to_air.name: This Will All Pass (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Meanwhile, Woo Tak decides to take a huge risk in order to help this trial be successful.

tv_shows.name: While You Were Sleeping
tv_shows.overview: Nam Hong Ju, endowed with the ability to foresee events, resides with her widowed mother who runs a small restaurant. Despite her gift, she often finds herself powerless to change the outcomes. On the other side of the street, Jung Jae Chan, a rookie prosecutor, and his younger brother Seung Won become their new neighbors. An unusual dream involving Hong Ju, ruthless attorney Lee Yu Beom, and a life-saving intervention leads Jae Chan to realize their destinies are intertwined, as they begin sharing dreams and connecting in mysterious ways.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Nam Hong Ju, endowed with the ability to foresee events, resides with her widowed mother who runs a small restaurant. Despite her gift, she often finds herself powerless to change the outcomes. On the other side of the street, Jung Jae Chan, a rookie prosecutor, and his younger brother Seung Won become their new neighbors. An unusual dream involving Hong Ju, ruthless attorney Lee Yu Beom, and a life-saving intervention leads Jae Chan to realize their destinies are intertwined, as they begin sharing dreams and connecting in mysterious ways.

tv_shows.tagline: That future, that time, that fate, can it be changed?

last_episode_to_air.name: End of the War
last_episode_to_air.overview: After aborting the mission, the kids walk for days but get to nowhere. However, they reach an amusement park and have fun as if it is their last. Meanwhile, Yeong-soo is not comfortable about walking away from the mission as he still believes the CSAT is not canceled. The end of the war draws near, but the kids have a long way left to survival.

tv_shows.name: Duty After School
tv_shows.overview: When mysterious alien spheres start invading the world, high school students are called upon to join the world's first war against extraterrestrial forces.
